message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $95. I believe it would be a valuable addition to what you already have.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand your perspective, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $87? It's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
